answers.answer: I was 120 pounds before pregnancy with my first child & I weighed almost 200 due to my preeclampsia which also caused excessive fluid retention. But now with this baby i'm currently 154 .
I'm the same way! I've gained a lot but I don't see it anywhere ! It drives me crazy but I plan on working out once I'm able
Yea I want to start working out also.
I'll have to research that word  because I don't know what it is...

question: My normal weight is always between 123-125. I'm currently 21 weeks preggo and weigh 142. I'm like where is it at because I haven't really noticed the extra pounds besides my tummy but once I TRY to put on my under garments or any bottom I'm like oooooo ok. I definitely see how weight gain can sneak upon you.
title: Weight Gain....
